div.span: we're old as fuck now! weird eh?

Wanted to say thank you for pointing me in the direction of hack reactor, and sorry for not getting in touch sooner. I'm on thesis status now, the work load and remote time difference crushed my free time haha.
I have an idea I wanted to run by you. I'm going to apply for HIR and and pitch them this but I want to speak to you as well and get your thoughts
I want to open an HR in HK, with a summer program dedicated to the expat students of HK
This will also serve as a secondary remote program hq, which will benefit all the HR remote students from hk/india/london, etc
I think this is very doable considering the people we know in hong kong, and my mothers connections with all the schools and banks in Hong kong because of her time as cfo of hkis
when I thought of this idea I thought of you, and I was wondering if you had any interest in pursuing this with me, before I speak to HR
Anyway sorry for the wall of text, Happy bday! Speak to you soon hopefully

message.div: thanks for the birthday wishes and for thinking of me!
it's totally doable, what you're thinking of
there is actually a group of alumns in HK that started a contracting shop out of there, since one of them is pretty active in the business/startup community there
Willson Mok was with them until he had visa issues and had to move back to the US
you should reach out to him!
Unfortunately, I'm pretty happy here in SF
but I do know that, if you are interested in pursuing Remote Beta, you should have a chat with some of the staff members about what kinds of things need to be built for it
because it's, as the name implies, still in beta
and the infrastructure that supports it is still in development — i think?

div.span: -782460593@chat.facebook.com is now known as Scourge Nuggles.
